Uses of Package
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest

  • Packages that use com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest 
    Package Description
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm
    Provides the classes necessary for the Infinitum ORM.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.internal.bind
    Provides classes containing internally bound values.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest
    Provides the classes necessary for RESTful object-relational mapping.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the RESTful ORM framework.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the SQLite ORM framework.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm 
    Class and Description
    Deserializer
    A Deserializer is used to convert web service responses into domain objects.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.internal.bind 
    Class and Description
    RestfulPairsTypeAdapter
    Facilitates the mapping of Java data types to RESTful web service name-value pair fields.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest 
    Class and Description
    Deserializer
    A Deserializer is used to convert web service responses into domain objects.
    RestfulModelMap
    Abstract implementation of ModelMap representing a domain model instance mapped to a RESTful web service resource.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest.impl 
    Class and Description
    Deserializer
    A Deserializer is used to convert web service responses into domain objects.
    RestfulMapper
    This abstract implementation of ObjectMapper provides methods to map domain models to RESTful web service resources.
    RestfulModelMap
    Abstract implementation of ModelMap representing a domain model instance mapped to a RESTful web service resource.
    RestfulPairsTypeAdapter
    Facilitates the mapping of Java data types to RESTful web service name-value pair fields.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl 
    Class and Description
    Deserializer
    A Deserializer is used to convert web service responses into domain objects.
